Meet up at our meeting point
- BTS Station (Any Station, Wongwian Yai)
- Hotel Pickup (Hotel Pickup in Bangkok Area)
- Airport (Suvarnabhumi Airport)
- MRT Station (Any Station)
- Airport Rail Link Station (Any Station)
Depart to the floating market by a local boat. Adventure , culiner //icon fontganteng//      Actifities :  Transportation :  Max Person :           Ticket \n breakfast Women \n Rooms Have a touch of the good old Bangkok at the Civilian Monastery, enjoy the local floating market, and get excited in the very famous night life. You can sense all of those great life experiences in just a day!
